Package com.example.Table_Top_Gaming

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Deck
    Interface to allow flexability around Deck Objects
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddResourceDialogActivity
    This class creates a Dialog box that promps the user to enter a name for a new resource and the starting amount for that resource.
    AuthenticationActivity
    An activity to allow us to track user information.
    CameraActivity
    An activity to allow us to take pictures to use as player profile pictures.
    CardGameActivity  
    Die
    This class sets all the basic functions and variables that a "Die" should have
    DieRoller
    This class is a list of dice objects that lets you roll the individual die and will display the results in an orderly manner
    EditPlayerScoreDialogActivity
    This class creates a dialog activity that allows the player to edit the score of one of their resources
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    Game
    This class keeps all the information of the game and individual players including a list of players a deck of cards and a discard pile
    GameActivity
    This is the main activity of the application that allows the players to keep track of their scores and use a deck of cards
    GridViewActivity
    An activity designed to show the players and resources of the players lined up in a grid to allow them to be seen and read more easily.
    LoadGameActivity
    This Activity is for user loading a game either locally or from the cloud
    LoginActivity
    An activity used in conjunction with the Authentication Activity for User distinction.
    MainActivity
    This class represents the Main Activity window and sets the functions and buttons for that activity
    NewGameActivity
    This class represents the NewGameActivity window and sets the buttons and functions for this window
    Player
    Holds the information that each player will need, including points, resources, picture, name, etc.
    PlayingCard
    This class represents a individual playing card with a number and suit
    PlayingCardDeck
    This class represents an normal deck of 52 cards
    RecyclerViewAdapter
    An adapter to go between the Card Activity and the game profile to display player's hands.
    Resource
    This class represents a resource that player would have and lets them manipulate that value
    RollDiceActivity
    Creates the Roll Dice Activity
    SaveGameActivity
    This class represents the SaveGameActivity window and provides the different functions and buttons for this activity
    Test  
    TestDie
    Unit tests for the Die Class
    TestDieRoller
    Unit tests for the Die Roller class.
    TestGame
    Unit tests for the Game class.
    TestPlayer  
    TestPlayingCard
    Unit tests for the PlayingCard class.
    TestPlayingCardDeck
    Unit tests for the PlayingCardDeck
    TestResource
    Unit tests for the Resource class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Suit
    This class represents a suit on a Playing card
